member.name: DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FULLSCREEN_DESC
member.summary: Describes full-screen mode for a swap chain.

member.name: DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FULLSCREEN_DESC.RefreshRate
member.summary: A structure that describes the refresh rate in hertz.

member.name: DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FULLSCREEN_DESC.ScanlineOrdering
member.summary: A member of the DXGI_MODE_SCANLINE_ORDER enumerated type that describes the scan-line drawing mode.

member.name: DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FULLSCREEN_DESC.Scaling
member.summary: A member of the DXGI_MODE_SCALING enumerated type that describes the scaling mode.

member.name: DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_FULLSCREEN_DESC.Windowed
member.summary: A Boolean value that specifies whether the swap chain is in windowed mode. TRUE if the swap chain is in windowed mode; otherwise, FALSE.
